alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 6:31PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 715 PM MST... At 631 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gila Bend, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend, Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, Cotton Center and Bosque. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 108 and 121. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 5. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 1 and 5, and between mile markers 119 and 135. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert
